name: Baitcoin
description: Baitcoin is a full-on-chain liquidity protocol with Decentralized financing that can be implemented on any smart contract-enabled blockchain. It has been attached with Binance Smart Chain, designed with maximum usage facilities for the investors, and can be used as a fuel for innumerable online services. The project has been designed by the developers to ensure maximum security, and guarantee better rewards. Its roadmap, token distribution, and coin burn programs are clearly defined so Baitcoin investors can have the utmost confidence in the project. The token is sure to help investors attain maximum financial freedom, while also distributing Baitcoin rewards to everyone using the token. As a result of this, every Baitcoin holder is incentivized to spread the use of Baitcoin as much as possi- ble. As the platform gains more traction and more transactions take place on the network, the token will benefit from an increased exposure, which would ultimately benefit investors in the long run.
